targets.queryText: WITH latest_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current ), prev_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), cur AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), prev AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date) ) SELECT (CAST(json_extract(cur.j,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(prev.j,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL)) AS value FROM cur, prev;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current ), prev_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), cur AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), prev AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date) ) SELECT (CAST(json_extract(cur.j,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(prev.j,'$.totals.market_value') AS REAL)) AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText: WITH latest_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current ), prev_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), cur AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), prev AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date) ) SELECT (CAST(json_extract(cur.j,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(prev.j,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL)) AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText: WITH latest_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current ), prev_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), cur AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), prev AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date) ) SELECT (CAST(json_extract(cur.j,'$.income.forward_12m_total') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(prev.j,'$.income.forward_12m_total') AS REAL)) AS value FROM cur, prev;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current ), prev_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), cur AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), prev AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date) ) SELECT (CAST(json_extract(cur.j,'$.income.forward_12m_total') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(prev.j,'$.income.forward_12m_total') AS REAL)) AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText: WITH latest_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current ), prev_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), cur AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), prev AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date) ) SELECT (CAST(json_extract(cur.j,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(prev.j,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL)) AS value FROM cur, prev;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current ), prev_date AS (   SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), cur AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date) ), prev AS (   SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current   WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date) ) SELECT (CAST(json_extract(cur.j,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(prev.j,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL)) AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText:
WITH latest_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current),
prev_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date)),
cur AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local=(SELECT d FROM latest_date)),
prev AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local=(SELECT d FROM prev_date)),
cur_h AS (SELECT json_each.value AS v FROM cur, json_each(cur.j,'$.holdings')),
prev_h AS (SELECT json_each.value AS v FROM prev, json_each(prev.j,'$.holdings'))
SELECT
  json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') AS symbol,
  (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL)) AS mv_delta,
  (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL)) AS weight_delta,
  (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL)) AS income_delta
FROM cur_h c
JOIN prev_h p ON json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') = json_extract(p.v,'$.symbol')
ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC;
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH latest_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current),
prev_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date)),
cur AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local=(SELECT d FROM latest_date)),
prev AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local=(SELECT d FROM prev_date)),
cur_h AS (SELECT json_each.value AS v FROM cur, json_each(cur.j,'$.holdings')),
prev_h AS (SELECT json_each.value AS v FROM prev, json_each(prev.j,'$.holdings'))
SELECT
  json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') AS symbol,
  (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.market_value') AS REAL)) AS mv_delta,
  (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL)) AS weight_delta,
  (CAST(json_extract(c.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) - CAST(json_extract(p.v,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL)) AS income_delta
FROM cur_h c
JOIN prev_h p ON json_extract(c.v,'$.symbol') = json_extract(p.v,'$.symbol')
ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC;
